item.title: Our Git Workflow
item.description: We use both Github and Bitbucket to host our code. Our git workflow is based on the use of branches and pull requests. When trying to add or change something significant in size, the expected workflow is as follows:

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to our new site. The site is built with Hugo using the Prologue theme (although heavily modified), hosted on Github Pages. If we have something interesting to say during the development process, we will post it as a blog article, otherwise this site serves as reference to point to other online resources.
